## Summary

A concise description of the feature you'd like.

## Motivation

Why is this useful? What problem does it solve?

## Proposed Syntax

If this is a language feature, show what the code would look like:

```
# Example sauravcode using the proposed feature
```

## Alternatives Considered

Have you thought about other ways to achieve this?

## Scope

Which part of the project does this affect?

- [ ] Language syntax / grammar
- [ ] Interpreter (`saurav.py`)
- [ ] Compiler (`sauravcc.py`)
- [ ] Standard library / built-ins
- [ ] Documentation
- [ ] Tooling (editor support, REPL, etc.)

Any other details, references, or examples from other languages.
